answerText: The Fateful Adventures of the Good Soldier vejk During the World War (accept Osudy Dobrého Vojáka vejka za Světové Války; accept Good Soldier Schweik or Good Soldier Schwejk)[10] Haek was a writer of this ethnicity, shared by the author of The Unbearable Lightness of Being, Milan Kundera.

question: Question:  [10] Name this novel by Jaroslav Haek about a "certified imbecile" who serves in the AustroHungarian Empire.
